title: ‘Thief’ throws brick at car – only for it to bounce back in his face
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

This is the moment a potential thief falls victim to immediate karma for trying to launch a brick at a car window.

Martin Craig’s home CCTV footage shows the moment a man tries to break into his car on Saturday morning.

But his plan fails miserably when the brick bounces off the window and straight back at his head.

Left with a sore face and an even more bruised ego, he then quickly flees Martin’s home, in Brandon, Durham.

Martin, who uses a wheelchair, was so shocked to find the footage he uploaded it to Facebook, where it has racked up thousands of views and comical comments.

In the video, a hooded man can be seen walking past Martin’s Citroen Berlingo presumably checking to see if the coast is clear.

He soon returns and picks up a nearby brick, before walking towards the car window and launching it at the vehicle with all his might.

The man is seen launching the brick at the car (Picture: Deadline News)

Before it bounces right back in his face (Picture: Deadline News)

He is knocked backwards seemingly in pain from the hit (Picture: Deadline News)

But the brick ricochets off the car window and strikes the man in the face before landing in front of him.

He then clutches his head in pain and takes a few moments to compose himself before almost tripping over the brick.

The man then picks the brick up, drops it into a garden next door and walks away defeated.

Many social media users have found the incident hilarious and said he ‘deserved it’.

One wrote: ‘Cracker! What karma! Talk about bricking it!’, while another said: ‘What a great bit of karma… idiot.’

Martin today said his car only suffered a few scratches and said the clip left him in hysterics.

He said: ‘Just scratches to glass and paint work. No idea why it was my car he targeted unless he knows that I’m in a wheelchair, so an easy target.

‘I just burst out laughing. Think that’s karma for you.’

description: The man tried to break into the man's car in Durham, with a brick before it bounced back in his face.
